variable:parameter.name: FinancialReportingPeriodPrePrePrePreviousEndDateParam
variable:parameter.select: if(count(//jenv-bw2-i:FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDate) eq 1) then xs:date(//jenv-bw2-i:FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDate) - xs:yearMonthDuration('P2Y') - xs:dayTimeDuration('PT24H') else(if(count(//jenv-bw2-i:FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate) eq 1)then xs:date(//jenv-bw2-i:FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate) - xs:yearMonthDuration('P3Y') - xs:dayTimeDuration('PT24H') - xs:dayTimeDuration('PT24H') else xs:date('2020-12-31'))
